tomem package

Store files in memory with memcached.

Uses a ledger to keep track of stored files informations such as name, size and checksum to ensure data integrity. A custom uid can be provided (using the uid::/file/path format) otherwise a human-readable one will be provided.

This is a personal project and a work in progress.

Examples:

# Store files (specify custom uid with `::` prefix)
$ python tomem --store images/cat.png ./report.xls customid::/tmp/data.bin

# Retrieve files using their uids
$ python tomem --retrieve butcheress oversteer
$ ls -l
cat.png report.xls

# List stored files
$ python tomem --list
* butcheress - cat.png
* oversteer - report.xls
* customid - data.bin

# Wipe every file from memory
$ python tomem --flush-all
3 items deleted freeing 1.4MiB

A Python API is available through the MemStore class.

Subpackages

  • MemStore
  • MemLedger
  • Utils
